short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This screen capturing and annotation extension for applications built with www.trova.in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to enable screen sharing for trova.in (https://www.trova.in).

This addon helps the trova users to share their screen secured, right from their browser.
